text: Răzvan Horj (born 17 December 1995) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Liga I club Gaz Metan Mediaș.CFR Cluj l-a cedat pe Răzvan Horj la Academica Clinceni. stiripesurse.ro ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Cluj |- |2016–17 |26||0||1||0||–||–||27||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||26||0||1||0||–||–||27||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Viitorul |- |2017–18 |11||0||2||0||–||–||13||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||11||0||2||0||–||–||13||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Voluntari |- |2017–18 |10||0||0||0||–||–||10||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||10||0||0||0||–||–||10||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Újpest |- |2018–19 |2||1||1||0||2||0||5||1 |- |- style="font- weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||2||1||1||0||2||0||5||1 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="1" valign="top"|Career Total | |49||1||4||0||2||0||55||1 |} Updated to games played as of 16 December 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maramureș County Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CFR Cluj players Category:FC Viitorul Constanța players Category:FC Voluntari players Category:FC Universitatea Cluj players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Újpest FC players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary
